pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Rent Yachts rentyachts@gmail.com +91-789-5500236 Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600009, India Home About us Our Team Contacts Privacy Policy Collection of Information: We collect various types of information when you engage with our yacht rental services, including personal information such as your name, contact details, payment information, and preferences. Additionally, we may collect non-personal information such as your IP address, browser type, and device information. Use of Information: The information we collect is used to provide and improve our yacht rental services, personalize your experience, process transactions, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform. We may also use your information for marketing purposes with your consent. Data Security: We implement robust security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include encryption, access controls, and regular security audits. Information Sharing: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or servicing you. However, we do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties for their marketing purposes. Retention of Information: We retain your information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Third-Party Links: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties and encourage you to review their privacy policies. Children's Privacy: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us to request its deletion. Updates to Privacy Policy: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website or through other appropriate means. Consent: By using our website and services, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. Contact Us: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us using the information provided at rentyachts@gmail.com. GDPR Compliance: We are committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws. If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain rights regarding your personal information under GDPR. California Privacy Rights: California residents have certain rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), including the right to request information about the categories of personal information we have collected and the right to opt-out of the sale of their personal information. International Data Transfers: Your information may be transferred to and stored on servers located outside of your country or jurisdiction, including in countries that may not provide the same level of data protection as your home country. By using our services, you consent to such transfers. Language: This Privacy Policy is written in English. If there are any discrepancies between the English version and a translated version, the English version shall prevail. Effective Date: This Privacy Policy was last updated on [insert date]. Any changes or updates to the policy will be effective immediately upon posting. Acceptance: By continuing to use our website and services after being notified of changes to this Privacy Policy, you acknowledge and agree to the updated terms. Rent Yachts your premier destination for luxury yacht rentals! Embark on an unforgettable journey with us as you explore the world's most stunning coastlines and indulge in the ultimate maritime experience. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - Rent Yachts rentyachts@gmail.com +91-789-5500236 Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600009, India Home About us Our Team Contacts Terms and Conditions Scope of Agreement: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Rent Yachts website and services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to abide by these terms and enter into a legally binding agreement with Rent Yachts. Yacht Rental Agreement: When you book a yacht rental through our platform, you enter into a separate rental agreement with Rent Yachts. This agreement outlines the terms and conditions specific to your rental, including rental duration, payment terms, and cancellation policies. Booking and Payment: To book a yacht rental, you must provide accurate and complete information, including payment details. By confirming a booking, you authorize Rent Yachts to charge the specified amount to your chosen payment method. Cancellation and Refunds: Our cancellation policy varies depending on the type of booking and rental terms. Please review the specific cancellation policy applicable to your booking before confirming. Refunds may be issued in accordance with our refund policy. Use of Yacht: When using a rented yacht, you agree to comply with all applicable laws, regulations, and safety guidelines. You are responsible for the proper care and maintenance of the yacht during the rental period. Liability: Rent Yachts is not liable for any loss, damage, injury, or inconvenience resulting from your use of our platform or rented yachts. You assume all risks associated with yacht rental and usage. Insurance: Rent Yachts may offer insurance options for yacht rentals, but it is your responsibility to ensure adequate insurance coverage for your rental. We recommend consulting with your insurance provider to determine the appropriate coverage. Intellectual Property: All content and materials on the Rent Yachts website, including logos, trademarks, and copyrighted works, are owned or licensed by Rent Yachts. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content without our prior written consent. User Conduct: You agree to use our platform and services responsibly and in accordance with these Terms and Conditions. Prohibited activities include but are not limited to: unauthorized access, interference with our systems, and violation of third-party rights. Modification of Terms: Rent Yachts reserves the right to modify or update these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our platform constitutes acceptance of the updated terms. Termination: Rent Yachts may terminate or suspend your access to our platform at any time for violation of these Terms and Conditions or for any other reason deemed necessary. Upon termination, you must cease all use of our platform. Indemnification: You agree to indemnify and hold Rent Yachts harmless from any claims, damages, losses, or liabilities arising out of your use of our platform or violation of these Terms and Conditions. Dispute Resolution: Any disputes arising from these Terms and Conditions or your use of our platform shall be resolved through arbitration in accordance with the laws of India. Severability: If any provision of these Terms and Conditions is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. Waiver: Failure by Rent Yachts to enforce any provision of these Terms and Conditions shall not constitute a waiver of such provision or any other rights. Entire Agreement: These Terms and Conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and Rent Yachts regarding your use of our platform, superseding any prior agreements or understandings. Contact Us: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us using the information provided at rentyachts@gmail.com. Effective Date: Any changes or updates to the terms will be effective immediately upon posting. Rent Yachts your premier destination for luxury yacht rentals! Embark on an unforgettable journey with us as you explore the world's most stunning coastlines and indulge in the ultimate maritime experience.
